Actionscript.script: import fl.video.FLVPlayback; import fl.video.VideoEvent; import flash.events.MouseEvent; import flash.net.URLRequest; var paramObj:Object = LoaderInfo(this.root.loaderInfo).parameters; var titleTxt:String = paramObj.hasOwnProperty("titleTxt") ? paramObj.titleTxt : "Title Text"; var vidSrc:String = paramObj.hasOwnProperty("vidSrc") ? paramObj.vidSrc : "http://c3323853.r53.cf0.rackcdn.com/Meijer_Poster.flv"; var clickTxt:String = paramObj.hasOwnProperty("clickTxt") ? paramObj.clickTxt : "Click Text"; var clickUrl:String = paramObj.hasOwnProperty("clickUrl") ? paramObj.clickUrl : "http://www.meijer.com/content/content_leftnav_manual.jsp?pageName=meijer_photo"; var vp:FLVPlayback = mc_video.vidPlayer; addVideoListeners(); vp.source = vidSrc; vp.playWhenEnoughDownloaded(); vp.getVideoPlayer(vp.activeVideoPlayerIndex).smoothing = true; function addVideoListeners():void { vp.addEventListener( VideoEvent.COMPLETE, onVideoComplete ); vp.addEventListener( VideoEvent.STATE_CHANGE, onVideoEvent ); } function onVideoEvent( e:VideoEvent ):void { trace(e, e.state, flash.utils.getTimer()); switch (e.state) { case "loading": mc_video.loadingAnim.visible = true; mc_video.endframe.visible = false; break; case "playing": mc_video.loadingAnim.visible = false; mc_video.endframe.visible = false; break; } } function onVideoComplete( e:VideoEvent ):void { //show replay button mc_video.endframe.visible = true; } btn_close.addEventListener( MouseEvent.CLICK, onCloseClick ); function onCloseClick( e:MouseEvent ):void { ExternalInterface.call("closeVideoModal"); } txtTitle.htmlText = titleTxt; mc_video.endframe.btn_cta.addEventListener( MouseEvent.CLICK, onCTAClick ); function onCTAClick( e:MouseEvent ):void { navigateToURL(new URLRequest( clickUrl ), "_top"); } mc_video.endframe.btn_replay.addEventListener( MouseEvent.CLICK, onReplayClick ); function onReplayClick( e:MouseEvent ):void { vp.seek(0); vp.play(); }
